The white car (car_2) is located behind a light-colored truck (truck_1), possibly following it.
In the far right of the lane, there is another white car (car_4), which is in motion.
Behind car_2 and truck_1, there are several vehicles in sequence (car_7, car_8, car_9, car_10, car_11).
On the right side of the road, there is a green belt and several trees.
The ego-vehicle is following a series of vehicles in the direction of the lane, with a clear view ahead and road markings.
The traffic conditions on the road in the video are relatively smooth, with no obvious congestion ahead.
